title: Life as a Farmer: A Day in the Fields #farmerlife #agriculture #shortsyoutube #life

tasks.task: Arrive at the strawberry field for pick-up
subtasks: Drive a pickup truck to the strawberry field
Open the tailgate to access the bins
Bend over to reach low-lying strawberry plants
Reach between strawberry plants to摘取 berries
Place the strawberries into the bins
Periodically check the weight or volume of the bins

tasks.task: Load pick-up truck with filled bins
subtasks: Bend down to assist bins into the truck bed
Stack bins neatly in the truck bed

tasks.task: Transport strawberries to the packing shed
subtasks: Drive the pickup truck to the packing shed
Park the truck in a designated area
Unload the bins from the truck

tasks.task: Transfer strawberries from bins to packing equipment
subtasks: Open bins to access the strawberries
Carefully pour or pour the strawberries onto the packing line
Remove bins and other equipment from the field
Clean any spilled berries or equipment
Drive the pickup truck back to the original location
Close the tailgate when leaving the field
